Fresh4Less Winter Solstice Jam 2015

Jam time remaining:

0 days, 0 hours, 0 minutes, 0 seconds

Theme:

Snowed in

Join Fresh4Less this holiday season for the semi-annual Solstice Jam! Make something interactive in 24 hours and share it for a chance to win SWEET PRIZES.

What is the Fresh4Less Winter Solstice Jam?

The Winter Solstice Jam is a competition to create an interactive project from scratch in 24 hours. You get to choose when you begin your 24 hour entry, so you can fit it into your schedule.

Everyone who participates must judge every other entry and vote for their favorite. The winner and runner-up will both win a prize. Collaboration is not allowed.

What can I enter?

Anything interactive. It's up to you what interactive means. Your entry doesn't necessarily need to require a computer to be experienced, but it does need to be submitted on this webpage so anyone in the world can experience it for themself. Your entry should be related to the theme in some way.

The majority of your entry should be designed and created during the 24 hours you participate in the jam. It's okay to use frameworks, templates, and some art and audio assets not created during the jam.

How does it work?

Whenever you're ready, click the button above to join the jam. Enter your name and you'll be given a secret code. Once you enter, the 24 hour timer starts ticking down. You can submit files by finding your name in the submission list below and entering your secret code. You may submit as many times as you would like before the countdown reaches zero. Once it hits zero, you will not be able to upload any more files. Your most recent upload will be downloadable by other participants after your entry time has expired.

How do I vote?

When the jam ends, the two week voting period will begin. If you made a submission, you can visit this page and vote on entries, using your secret code. You can give your favorite entry two votes, and your second favorite entry one vote.

When the voting period ends, the winner and runner-up will be announced and awarded their prizes. As a participant in the jam, you are required to try every entry and cast a vote. If you do not vote, you will not receive any prizes.

What can I win?

The first place prize is a Fresh4Less Winter Jam 2016 Winner Congratulatory Mug.

The runner-up will receive three, count 'em, three Fresh4Less Winter Jam 2016 Magnets, to decorate their refrigerator. Additionally, every participant will receive one Fresh4Less Winter Jam 2016 Magnet

What if I have more questions?

You can contact Elliot at elliot@neurotischism.com
